body.name: Lee Women's Ultra Lux Comfort with Flex Motion Trouser Pant
features: REGULAR FIT. With a regular fit and mid rise, these pants are a work-wear must. These women's trousers have a flexible non-binding waistband for all-day comfort.

FLEX MOTION. Made with flexible fabric and a non-binding waistband, these women's dress pants are made for long days. A work-appropriate classic, perfect for mixing and matching with your favorite tops.
DISCREET POCKETS. Two front slant pockets and back welt pockets offer convenient small-item storage.

A LIFETIME OF QUALITY. For over 100 years, Lee has produced quality apparel with durability and long-lasting construction in mind. Lee is committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely.

SPECIFICATIONS. Zipper fly with button closure, rise: 9.75", leg opening: 20", inseam: Short 30", Medium 32", Long 34", product measurements were taken using size 10 medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
body.description: Just like our founder, H.D. Lee, our passion is helping can-do people do more. We are committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely. We help you chase the things that bring you joy and laughter. The things that make you fearless and hopefully because your passion is what makes you unique. And what moves you, moves us. Move your Lee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit is GREAT!
reviews.reviewText: I needed some dress pants for work - these were on sale so I thought I’d give them a try. I was surprised at how nice the material is and they do the trick for a dress pant - BUT with the added bonus of comfort.I’m normally a 16/18 - went with the 18 because I didn’t want to look poured in (and honestly, because I’m lazy and had no intention of sending them back and if they were a bit big, I’d still wear them 😉). Anywho - they are a bit loose in the waist, but nothing a belt or a full meal won’t combat. I also got them in long (I’m 5’9”), and they are perfect with a heel.I’m definitely going to order more and if I’m planning on wear flats - I will get the regular length.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought in 3 colors. LOVE THEM!
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5'6, 180# and bought the 14L. Overall, I love these pants so much that I bought 3 more colors after getting my first pair. A few comments:1. getting the LONG not only made the length of the pants leg longer, it also made the rise of the pant longer. The fit was so much better in the Long vs. the regular length that it is worth the extra trouble of having to hem them.2. The fabric, not just the color, varies from color to color. The "black" is NOT black denim; it is truly a stretchy but very professional and/or dressy looking pair of black slacks. On the other hand, the indigo rinse and the carbon rinse look and feel like denim with a great amount of stretch in the heavyweight fabric. SUPER flattering.I love these pants, in the 3 colors I've bought so far, because they are consistently flattering for my curvy figure, loose but not drapey through the thigh, and have washed really well. I highly recommend these pants!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great pants--size up for more relaxed fit
reviews.reviewText: I love these pants; I find them very flattering on. The fabric is mid-weight and good quality, and the waist has some elastic built in to the waistband. The legs are slightly wide and have a slight flare, looking just like the picture. I would just say that if you want a more relaxed fit to size up, especially if you'e between sizes.EDIT: I now own a pair of these pants in khaki (which is slightly darker than pictured) and they run a bit roomier than the black pair. I would not size up in that shade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dressy denim.
reviews.reviewText: I like the high waist. The color of the denium trouser and they look very nice. Could dress up or down depending on other pieces. At 4’ 11” 36 hips 120lbs these were too long but I rolled them under once, used fabric glue and always wear with my pointed toe boots so I have a little heel and that elongated look since I’m short and I believe these are very flattering pants. They are thick material and wide. Love elasticity in the waist and the deep working pockets. I would love to try the other colors because they’re so comfortable and versatile for the office or to a social.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new go to work pant
reviews.reviewText: I purchased one, then 2 more. These are nice. Good quality and decent fit. I’ve worn and dried them, no shrinking. Hardly wrinkles. I have been working out of town traveling a lot and haven’t had to iron them. Definitely a different material than your typical business slacks and they do crease up a bit in the crotch area when sitting too long, but I got mine for restaurant work. Works well for what I need. My new go to work pant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Haven’t worn them yet, will tomorrow. Tried them on for fit, yesssss! Love the fabric with just a bit of stretch, soft and comfortable. The fit is fantastic, I’m 5’1”, and weigh 159# and bought the size 12 short. A little snug but I know a size up would be too big as I’m losing weight. They are a bit long even though I got the short length, but that allows for a decent heeled boot of about 2 1/2-3”. I already love these pants and will be ordering more!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY THESE PANTS NOW!
reviews.reviewText: I am 100% satisfied with these pants and will be buying another pair ASAP! For reference I am 5'9-ish and 185-ish lbs. (Height & weight are super important in reviews, and the review I read that made me decide to buy included this information.) I got a size 14 long. They fit PERFECTLY. Mid rise waist with snug fit at waist, hips and thighs, then they flow out just a little at the calves, just how I prefer my pants to look. Bootcut I suppose you'd call it. Not skinny, not straight leg, not flair. The material is thicker than I expected, which is a good thing. Deep front pockets. Kinda small back pockets, as most women's pants have. I work in hospitality (restaurant bartender) and black pants are standard uniform for me. Back pockets are just deep enough to hold my bottle opener and wine key. For work I have to crouch down low to stock things, bend in weird ways, and reach up high for stuff on shelves. And these pants dont fall down, slip out of place, or feel too restricting. I usually tuck my work shirt in, and these pants sit at the perfect spot on my waist to do so without feeling uncomfortable. They have belt loops so I can wear a belt with them which I like. Flexible material, but not flimsy. I typically wear a size 10 or 12. But after reading reviews, decided to size up, which was a good call. I can not stress enough how well they fit! If you are on the fence as to whether or not you should buy, just do it! You'll be glad you did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, smooth, fits well and easy to move around.
reviews.reviewText: The item arrived on time. The item is not constricting and allows free movement especially for some individuals that must move around a lot. It flattering, pant legs are big, can wear the item bit dressy occasions or casual. The item has elastic band that fit the waist. The item isn't too high on the hips and itn't too low on the waist.

reviews.reviewTitle: A bit long but otherwise good.
reviews.reviewText: They are a mid rise pant with quite a bit of stretch. The flex in the waist band is very comfortable. The material is heavier than average dress pants so they hang nicely as well. The fit is good other than the length, they are a bit too long and will need to be hemmed. I am 5'7 so if you are shorter you will likely need to take them to the tailor.
Pantalon vraiment fait grand j'aurais due prendre 2 point plus petitTissus tres confo
La talla perfecta como dice en la tabla de recomendación, de muy buena calidad, llegaron antes del tiempo estimado. Los volvería a comprar
Love it. It fits well and very comfortable. Just lovely

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable, good fit for curvy girls
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t worn these out yet but they fit perfectly and are very comfortable. I’m curvy (hips and thighs) and the thickness of the material makes them quite flattering. I’m looking forward to going back into the office so I can wear them.
